text: @jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden All I saw was him embarrassing himself and trying to prove he could lift a glass of water. Lying like this really. Stop bending over we know you are no better than he is. Better worry about those growing numbers if Coronavirus in your state! Y'all are killing people #COVIDIOTS
